name: Kublai Khan
description: '''Kublai Khan'''{{refn|name=Name|group=N|The band is referred to as '''Kublai Khan TX''' in released and promotional material following a conflict with the Minnesota thrash metal band of the same name.<ref>{{cite web |title=Report: Legal Dispute Brewing Between Two Different Bands Named Kublai Khan |url=https://www.theprp.com/2018/10/27/news/report-legal-dispute-brewing-between-two-different-bands-named-kublai-khan/ |website=The PRP |date=October 28, 2018 |access-date=December 11, 2021}}</ref>}} is an American [[metalcore]] band from [[Sherman, Texas]]. The group formed in the summer of 2009, and they have released five albums and two EPs.
